content: You can disable header in the mobile version to limit access to the {{productName}} sections (just like disabling the left menu in the desktop version).

comment.text: This translation key describes the content that will be displayed when users disable the header on mobile devices, explaining its purpose as limiting access to specific sections of a product. It appears in a UI component related to panel settings and is used for accessibility purposes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "الترويسة" (al-tarwisa) for 'header' is technically correct but sounds overly formal and might not be the most natural way to refer to a website header in a user-facing context. A more common and accessible term might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more colloquial term for 'header' like "الشريط العلوي" (al-sharee' al-'ulwi) or "الرأس" (ar-ra's).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic text uses a standard Arabic word order. While grammatically correct, for improved readability in a user interface, consider restructuring the sentence to flow more naturally for Arabic readers, possibly placing the reason at the beginning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يمكنك تعطيل الشريط العلوي في إصدار الجوال لتقييد الوصول إلى أقسام {{productName}}، تمامًا مثل تعطيل القائمة اليسرى في إصدار سطح المكتب.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "söndürmək kimi" (like turning off) is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'disabling'. It's too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a phrase like "məhdudlaşdırmaq kimi" (like limiting) or rephrasing to something more natural like "mobil versiyada başlığı deaktiv etmək, masaüstü versiyada sol menyunu gizlətmək kimi bir şeydir."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the double curly braces for `{{productName}}` are present, it's important to ensure the backend rendering correctly handles these placeholders in the Azerbaijani version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify that the rendering engine in the Azerbaijani locale correctly interprets and replaces `{{productName}}`.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses 'zákázat záhlaví' which is a bit clunky. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: V mobilní verzi můžete vypnout záhlaví...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'genau wie' (just like) can sound a bit clunky and formal in this context. A more natural phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sie können die Kopfzeile in der mobilen Version deaktivieren, um den Zugriff auf die {{productName}}-Abschnitte einzuschränken (ähnlich wie das Deaktivieren des linken Menüs in der Desktop-Version).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The curly brackets around 'productName' are inconsistent. The English content uses {{productName}}, while the Greek translation doesn't. This needs to be standardized.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change the Greek translation to: Μπορείτε να απενεργοποιήσετε την κεφαλίδα στην έκδοση για κινητά για να περιορίσετε την πρόσβαση στα τμήματα του {{productName}} (όπως ακριβώς απενεργοποιείτε το αριστερό μενού στην έκδοση για υπολογιστές).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "header" is translated as "ylätunniste". While technically correct, "otsikko" or "pääotsikko" might be more natural and understandable for a broader Finnish audience. "Ylätunniste" is a more technical term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'otsikko' or 'pääotsikko' instead of 'ylätunniste'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parentheses after "mobiiliversiossa" are slightly awkward. The sentence flow can be improved by repositioning them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to 'Voit poistaa otsikon käytöstä mobiiliversiossa, mikä rajoittaa pääsyä...' or 'Voit poistaa otsikon käytöstä mobiiliversiossa, jolloin pääsy...'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "identique à" is a literal translation of "just like" and sounds slightly awkward in French. A more natural phrasing would be 'comme' or 'de la même manière que'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous pouvez désactiver l'en-tête dans la version mobile pour limiter l'accès aux sections de {{productName}} (comme la désactivation du menu de gauche dans la version de bureau).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "վերնագիրը" (vernagiry) translates to 'header' but in this context, 'header' is referring to a toolbar or navigation bar. A more accurate translation might be something like "նավագացման պանելը" (navagacman panely) or "վերին մասը" (verin masy).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "վերնագիրը" with "նավագացման պանելը" or "վերին մասը" for better accuracy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase “ձախ ընտրացանկն” (dax entracankn) directly translates to “left menu”. While accurate, a slightly more natural phrasing in Armenian might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to a more natural construction, like "ձախ դրացորդը" or "ձախ կողմը" depending on the precise meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'proprio come' is a bit verbose and could be more concise. While grammatically correct, it makes the sentence slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puoi disabilitare l'intestazione nella versione mobile per limitare l'accesso alle sezioni {{productName}} (come disabilitare il menu a sinistra nella versione desktop).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "just like disabling the left menu in the desktop version" is a bit clunky and doesn't flow naturally in Japanese. While technically correct, it lacks elegance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: モバイル版でヘッダーを無効にすることで、デスクトップ版で左メニューを無効にするのと同様に、{{productName}}セクションへのアクセスを制限できます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses around 'desktop' is unusual in Lao and makes the sentence slightly awkward. It's better to integrate it smoothly into the sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານ​ສາ​ມາດ​ປິດ​ການ​ທໍາ​ງານ header ໃນ​ສະ​ບັບ​ມື​ຖື​ເພື່ອ​ຈໍາ​ກັດ​ການ​ເຂົ້າ​ເຖິງ​ພາກ {{productName}} (ເຊັ່ນ​ດຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ປິດ​ການ​ທໍາ​ງານ​ຂອງ​ເມ​ນູ​ຊ້າຍ​ໃນ​ສະບັບ desktop ທີ່​ໃຊ້​ງານ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ຄອມພິວເຕີ້​).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ທີ່​ໃຊ້​ງານ​ຢູ່' (that is used) is an added word that isn't present in the original English. It adds unnecessary complexity and doesn't improve understanding. Consider omitting it for a more concise translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານ​ສາ​ມາດ​ປິດ​ການ​ທໍາ​ງານ header ໃນ​ສະ​ບັບ​ມື​ຖື​ເພື່ອ​ຈໍາ​ກັດ​ການ​ເຂົ້າ​ເຖິງ​ພາກ {{productName}} (ເຊັ່ນ​ດຽວ​ກັບ​ການ​ປິດ​ການ​ທໍາ​ງານ​ຂອງ​ເມ​ນູ​ຊ້າຍ​ໃນ​ສະບັບ desktop​)​.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses parentheses instead of brackets for the `{{productName}}` placeholder. This is inconsistent with the English version which uses brackets.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change `{{productName}}` to `[productName]`

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "analogicznie do" is a bit formal and doesn't flow as naturally as alternatives. A more colloquial and direct translation would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Możesz wyłączyć nagłówek w wersji mobilnej, aby ograniczyć dostęp do sekcji {{productName}} (podobnie jak wyłączenie menu po lewej stronie w wersji na komputery).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, 'komputery stacjonarne' is slightly more formal than necessary. It's generally understood that 'komputery' refers to desktop computers in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Możesz wyłączyć nagłówek w wersji mobilnej, aby ograniczyć dostęp do sekcji {{productName}} (podobnie jak wyłączenie menu po lewej stronie w wersji na komputery).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'header' is translated as 'antetul'. While technically correct, 'header' can also be translated as 'bara de sus' or 'cap de pagină' for better clarity in this context. 'Antetul' sounds a bit formal and less natural in this scenario.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'header' as 'bara de sus' or 'cap de pagină'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "වැඩතල අනුවාදයේ වම්පස වට්ටෝරුව" is a literal translation of "left menu" and might not be the most natural or clear way to express the concept in Sinhala. It's a bit clunky and doesn't quite capture the nuance of a menu in a desktop application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like "ඩෙස්‍ටොප් අනුවාදයේ පේනුව" or "ඩෙස්‍ටොප් අනුවාදයේ මාර්ග පෙන්වීම" to more naturally convey the meaning of 'left menu' in a desktop environment.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of the Sinhala script within the otherwise Sinhala sentence feels jarring. While technically correct, it might be more natural to fully integrate the variable into the sentence using the same script.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing '{{productName}}' with the Sinhala equivalent of 'productName', or integrating it more seamlessly into the Sinhala flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "hlavičku" (header) is technically correct but can sound a bit awkward in this context. A more natural Slovak phrasing might use a term like "hornej lišty" (top bar) or rephrase to avoid the direct translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "hlavičku" with "hornej lišty" or rephrasing to something like: "V mobilnej verzii môžete vypnúť hornú lištu a obmedziť tak prístup..."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses parentheses instead of brackets for the placeholder {{productName}}. The English content uses brackets.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: V mobilni različici lahko onemogočite glavo, da omejite dostop do razdelkov {{productName}} (tako kot onemogočite levi meni v namizni različici).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "баш као да онемогуц́ите леви мени у верзији за десктоп" is a bit awkward and could be improved for clarity.  A more natural phrasing would emphasize the equivalence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: баш као што је леви мени онемогућен у десктоп верзији.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "-а" after {{productName}} feels slightly unnatural in this context. It would be more consistent to either omit it or use a more flexible formulation that doesn't require a possessive ending.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}} или {{productName}} секције

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a hyphenated possessive construction ('productName-a'). In Serbian, it's more natural to use a genitive case suffix directly: 'productName-e'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete da onemogućite zaglavlje u mobilnoj verziji da biste ograničili pristup odeljcima {{productName}}-e (baš kao da onemogućite levi meni u verziji za desktop).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "just like disabling the left menu in the desktop version" could be more naturally translated.  A more common phrasing in Turkish would emphasize the parallel nature of the action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: masaüstü sürümünde sol menüyü devre dışı bırakmak gibi bir şekilde

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'простору {{productName}}' (space {{productName}}) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'sections' in the English context. It sounds unnatural in Ukrainian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: розділів {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'подібно вимкненню' is awkward. It could be phrased more elegantly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: як і вимкнення

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'header' is translated as 'tiêu đề'. While technically correct, 'header' in this context refers to a specific UI element. A more precise translation might be 'thanh tiêu đề' or 'đầu trang'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể tắt thanh tiêu đề trong phiên bản dành cho thiết bị di động để hạn chế quyền truy cập vào các phần {{productName}} (giống như tắt menu bên trái trong phiên bản dành cho máy tính để bàn).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "禁用标题" (disable header) is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it doesn't convey the intended meaning as smoothly as other options.  A more natural phrasing would be something like "禁用头部" or "隐藏头部" which is more common for user interface elements.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您可以在移动版本中禁用头部以限制对{{productName}}部分的访问（就像在桌面版本中禁用左侧菜单一样）。 or 您可以在移动版本中隐藏头部以限制对{{productName}}部分的访问（就像在桌面版本中禁用左侧菜单一样）。
